game.randomevent

Class RandomEvent

  • java.lang.Object
    • game.randomevent.RandomEvent
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class RandomEvent
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    Represents a random event such as the Team getting robbed or gifted an item.
    Author:
    jesse
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Constructor Detail

      • RandomEvent

        public RandomEvent()
        Creates a new instance of RandomEvent. Also calculates whether or not the event happens.

    • Method Detail

      • occurred

        public boolean occurred()
        Returns:
        True if any event occurred. False otherwise.

      • getEventType

        public RandomEventType getEventType()
        Returns:
        The type of random event that occurred. Or null if no event occurred.

      • performEvent

        public void performEvent(Team team)
                  throws RobberyPreventedException,
                         MoneyRobbedException,
                         ItemRobbedException,
                         ItemGiftedException
        Performs the random event.
        Parameters:
        team - The Team who is subject to a random event
        Throws:
        RobberyPreventedException - When a law student is in the team and the team was robbed.
        MoneyRobbedException - When the team has no items to rob.
        ItemRobbedException - When the team is robbed.
        ItemGiftedException - When the team is gifted an item.
